org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin

Class AuthCurlProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin.CurlProcessor
      • org.ligoj.app.resource.plugin.AuthCurlProcessor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SessionAuthCurlProcessor

    public class AuthCurlProcessor
extends CurlProcessor
    Basic authenticated CURL processor. Credentials are sent in each request.
    See Also:
    for session based cookie after a Basi authentication., AUTH.WWW_AUTH_RESP

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuthCurlProcessor

        public AuthCurlProcessor(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password,
                         HttpResponseCallback callback)
        Full constructor holding credential and callback.
        Parameters:
        username - the user login. Empty or null login are accepted, but no authentication will be used.
        password - the user password or API token. null Password is converted to empty string, and still used when user is not empty.
        callback - Not null HttpResponseCallback used for each response.

      • AuthCurlProcessor

        public AuthCurlProcessor(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Constructor using parameters set.
        Parameters:
        username - the user login. Empty or null login are accepted, but no authentication will be used.
        password - the user password or API token. null Password is converted to empty string, and still used when user is not empty.
